section.title: Medical history
section.text: History of high blood pressure and urinary tract infections.

tr.td: Patient had pain and a raspy voice for a week after the operation

observation.value: Patient had pain and a raspy voice for a week after the operation

section.title: Family health
section.text: Maternal grandmother has diabetes, father of baby has hypertension, uncle has a congenital heart problem.

tr.td: Nuchal translucency 1.8 mm, fetal and maternal anatomy appear normal.
Growth scan, estimated fetal weight 2.5kg, AC close to 90th centile, normal lie and dopppler.

observation.value: Nuchal translucency 1.8 mm, fetal and maternal anatomy appear normal
Growth scan, estimated fetal weight 2.5kg, AC close to 90th centile, normal lie and dopppler

tr.td: Syphilis and hepatitis B screen negative, rubella immune. FBC normal, HIV screen negative.

observation.value: Syphilis and hepatitis B screen negative, rubella immune. FBC normal, HIV screen negative.

tr.td: Normal karyotype 46 XY, woman informed at clinic.
Anatomy scan to be performed at maternal fetal medicine clinic.

observation.value: Normal karyotype 46 XY, woman informed at clinic.
Anatomy scan to be performed at maternal fetal medicine clinic.

section.title: Birth plan
section.text: Breathing for as long as possible; then gas and epidural, if needed. Delivery position leaning over back of bed.

tr.th: Date and time cervix fully dilated
Date and time active pushing commenced

tr.td: Hypnotherapy was trialed during early labour
Leaning over back of the bed

code.displayName: Date and time cervix fully dilated
Date and time active pushing commenced

observation.value: Hypnotherapy was trialed during early labour
Leaning over back of the bed

tr.td: LSCS, adhesions on uterus and bladder noted

observation.value: LSCS, adhesions on uterus and bladder noted

tr.td: Oxytocin given, placenta delivered within 15 minutes
Used controlled cord traction and oxytocin

tr.th: Placenta, cord or membranes sent for pathology

observation.value: Oxytocin given, placenta delivered within 15 minutes
Used controlled cord traction and oxytocin

Date and time of feeding assessment

tr.td: Breastfeed for 6 months, bottle as reqd

observation.value: To breastfeed for 6 months using breast and bottle as required
